summary: Player-owned house in Telvanni settlement named Tel Mithryn, located on the eastern part of Solstheim. Made for an alchemist/mage, but usable by anyone.
descriptionHtml:
[i][b]I tested the house, but if you find any problems, contact me and I will fix them.

Please comment and tell me what you think about this mod :)
[/b][/i]

[size=3][b]REQUIREMENTS:[/b][/size]
- Latest version of Skyrim
- Dragonborn DLC

[b][size=3]LOCATION:[/size][/b]
The house is located on the eastern part of Solstheim, in a Telvanni settlement called Tel Mithryn.

I\'ve added a map marker, which you can see on the map, but can\'t fast travel to until you discover it.
You can get there very quickly on foot, from any part of Solstheim.

[i]ALL containers are safe[/i]

[b][size=3]FEATURES:[/size][/b]
-Free and companion-friendly small Telvanni-style house.
-Cooking pot and food storage.
-Alchemist workbench and ingredient storage.
-Enchanting workbench and soul gem storage.
-Staff enchanter
-Storage room to safely store all of your stuff.
-Hidden safe
-Mannequins
-Display cases
-Bookshelf
-Bed
-Small Ash Yam garden

[b][size=3]HOW TO INSTALL[/size][/b]
Extract the .rar file to your data folder, or use the Nexus Mod Manager to install the mod.

[b][size=3]COMPATIBILITY[/size][/b]
This mod can only conflict with mods which change the area this house is placed in.

[b][size=3]VERSION HISTORY[/size][/b]

[i]Version 1.1 [/i]

    Added a staff enchanter
    Fixed few flickering lights (I hope that\'s all of them) 

[i]Version 1.01[/i]

    Fixed a flickering light
    Changed the size and rotation of the ash yams
    Did a TES5Edit cleaning 


[b][size=3]RECOMMENDED MODS[/size][/b]
Solstheim Texture Overhaul
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31960
author: Archaonus
